vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting (1) an MU-3 Mixed Use District; and (2) a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned Subdistrict C and Subdistrict D within Planned Development No. 852 and RR Regional Retail District, on the northeast and northwest corners of Dallas North Tollway and President George Bush Turnpike
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z234-229(LG)
